entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • 8.0 SDK contains many assemblies with 6.0/7.0 assembly versions #34245

Closed

  • Configuration binder source generator enabled in Blazor WASM #34135
  • Native AOT doesn't work with Windows Forms #34129

PullRequests

Created

  • [draft] Containers: implementation of OAuth2 #34237
    untriaged, Area-Containers

Merged

  • Allow ResolveReadyToRunCompilers to be run under FreeBSD #31581
    untriaged, Area-ReadyToRun
  • [main] Disable ConfigurationBinder source generator in Blazor WASM #34220
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Remove unused usings #34225
    untriaged
  • Revert "#30336 Default Dotnet Tool to Run on Latest Runtime - Build time change" #34132
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Containers: Protocol correctness and quirk handling for Basic and Bearer authentication for registries #33753
    Servicing-approved, Area-Containers

Updated

  • Fix package verification for some valid packages on windows #34144
    Servicing-approved, Area-Infrastructure, 6.0.22
  • Configurable wwwroot for StaticWebAssets #34178
    Area-AspNetCore, 8.0.1xx
